name: A Kiss For The Petals - New Generation
description:
A Kiss For The Petals: The New Generation is a visual novel and the second part in the series after A Kiss For The Petals: Remembering How We Met.

The story is about girls from an all-girl school: Saint Michael Girls' School. The girls from the annex look up to the girls from the main campus and decide to vote on a "Best Couples"-poll, with contestants all from the annex. Three new couples are introduced into the series: Misawa Nagisa and Takahata Rina, Kimishima Ai and her younger sister Aya, and finally Onohara Hazuki and Suoh Manami. Hazuki is a exchange student and already had a secret crush on Manami before they were entered into the compitition.

The game features several adult scenes, but is mostly focused on the Yuri utopia that was build in the first game, and on the romance between characters.
